column1: A zillion must be a unit they use in political science labs!  Also who said the vaccine is more dangerous than the virus? I said if you’re under 30 and have fully recovered from a bout of COVID-19 it makes sense to get more data before getting the vaccine. I stand by that! https://t.co/Hej3sAQZe7

To be sure I’m not suggesting anyone should go out and try to contract Covid but I can’t imagine a reason someone under 30 who has already fully recovered from the virus would take the vaccine without at least another year’s worth of data.

Which immunity is superior?  Vaccines shown to be 70-90% effective at 7-14 days based on a few hundred cases of COVID-19.  or  Natural Immunity shown to be 99.999% effective at 8 months based on a few million cases.

@jtrammel1 My wife and I were just wondering what that number is - do you have a source?  Our local nursing home had about 13 resident deaths when COVID swept through and nearly all of the 80-90 residents (and most of the staff) tested positive during those few weeks.

Why hasn’t the % of all US deaths attributed to the older age bracket increased during the COVID-19 outbreak?  A researcher studying mortality data available from CDC made some interesting observations that don’t seem to comport with the Covid narrative.  https://t.co/rh7dp3VADp

@DureJane @chiproytx @CDCgov That’s the point of my tweet. Millions of cases (according to PCR test) thousands of deaths attributed to COVID-19 8 months (actually 12 worldwide) and they don’t have enough data? They’re not even trying.

The @CDCgov has been woefully negligent in researching COVID19 and providing reliable information.  They’ve had 8 months to answer questions about reinfection of SARS-CoV-2 yet this is what’s on their website... a list of fundamental questions they have thus far failed answer: https://t.co/0L7OI3JvNH
